extension.name: Events Booking - Advanced Events Slider
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.description: This module display events in a slider.

field.name: display_event_type
field.label: Display Event Type
field.description: Choose type of the events which will be displayed in module

field.name: category_ids
field.label: Categories
field.description: Choose the categories which you want to display events in this module. If no categories are selected, events from all categories will be displayed.

field.name: exclude_category_ids
field.label: Exclude Categories
field.description: Select categories which you want to exclude events from

field.name: location_id
field.label: Locations
field.description: Choose the locations which you want to display events

field.name: speaker_ids
field.label: Speakers
field.description: Select speakers which you want to display events from

field.name: created_by
field.label: Created By
field.description: If you select a user here, the module will only display events created by the selected user

field.name: show_children_events
field.label: Show Children Events
field.description: Choose whether to show or hide children events in the module

field.name: only_show_featured_events
field.label: Only Show Featured Events
field.description: If set to Yes, only featured events will be shown on this module

field.name: order_by
field.label: Order By
field.description: Choose how to sort/order events for this menu item

field.name: order_direction
field.label: Order Direction
field.description: Choose how to sort/order events for this menu item

field.name: number_events
field.label: Number Events
field.description: Number of events to be showed on the module

field.name: item_id
field.label: Menu Item ID
field.description: Menu Item ID

field.name: layout
field.label: Layout
field.description: Choose the layout which will be used to display events from this module

field.name: show_short_description
field.label: Show Short Description
field.description: Choose to show or hide short description in the horizontal layout

field.name: category_bg_color
field.label: Category Background Color
field.description: Leave it empty to use default background color

field.name: use_category_bg_color_from_category
field.label: Use Background Color From Category
field.description: If set to Yes, and background color is set inside the category, that color will be used instead of the default Category Background Color above

field.name: event_datetime_color
field.label: Event Datetime Color
field.description: Leave it empty to use default background color

field.name: arrows
field.label: Arrows
field.description: Determines whether to create arrows or not

field.name: pagination
field.label: Pagination
field.description: Determines whether to create pagination or not

field.name: number_items
field.label: Number Items
field.description: Number of slides being displayed in the viewport

field.name: interval
field.label: Auto Play Interval (Milliseconds)
field.description: The autoplay interval duration in milliseconds

field.name: gap
field.label: Gap
field.description: The gap between slides. The CSS format is acceptable, such as 1em

field.name: pre_text
field.label: Pre Text
field.description: If entered, the text will be displayed at the top of the module

field.name: post_text
field.label: Post Text
field.description: If entered, the text will be displayed at the bottom of the module

field.name: number_items_xs
field.label: Number Items Extra Small Viewport (less than 576px)
field.description: Number of slides being displayed In Extra Small viewport (portrait phones, less than 576px)

field.name: number_items_sm
field.label: Number Items Small Viewport (less than 768px)
field.description: Number of slides being displayed In Small viewport (landscape phones, less than 768px)

field.name: number_items_md
field.label: Number Items Medium Viewport (less than 992px)
field.description: Number of slides being displayed In Medium viewport (tablets, less than 992px)

field.name: number_items_lg
field.label: Number Items Large Viewport (less than 1200px)
field.description: Number of slides being displayed In Large viewport (desktops, less than 1200px)

field.name: show_on_pages
field.label: Show On Pages
field.description: Using syntax like com_eventbooking:category, event; com_content: article,categories to show module only on some views of the components you want. Leave it empty and it will always be shown
